message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $250?
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.

I understand that $250 is a bit high for you, but I think the product is worth more than $120. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $180. Would you be interested in buying it from me for that price?
I appreciate the compromise, but $180 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $150. I'll meet you at $170. It's a fair price, considering the product's value
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $160 for the product.
I'm not willing to go below $170, as I really need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to compromise at $165, but that's as low as I can go
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $165 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $155 for the product.
I'm really trying to find a mutually beneficial price, but I'm not willing to go below $165. I'll give you one last chance to meet me at $162. If not, I'll have to consider other options
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $162 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $152 for the product.
